game.name: Honor Mice
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dash, slash, and shoot through handcrafted levels across vibrant worlds in a fast-paced action platformer! Stop the forces of evil from stealing your mysterious lunch and uncover the destiny that awaits you!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dash, slash, and shoot through handcrafted levels across vibrant worlds in a fast-paced action platformer! Stop the forces of evil from stealing your mysterious lunch and uncover the destiny that awaits you!
